ðŸ’¡ rustnet | Rust
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Real-time network monitoring and analysis with detailed connection information and protocol inspection.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Real-time Network Monitoring â€¢ Connection States Display (TCP, QUIC, DNS, SSH) â€¢ Deep Packet Inspection (HTTP, HTTPS/TLS, DNS, SSH, QUIC) â€¢ Connection Lifecycle Management with configurable timeouts â€¢ Process Identification (with experimental eBPF support)
ðŸ“– Summary: RustNet is a cross-platform network monitoring tool built in Rust that provides real-time visibility into network connections. It offers features like deep packet inspection, connection lifecycle management, and a terminal user interface for monitoring TCP, UDP, ICMP, ARP, and QUIC connections, along with process identification and service name resolution.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ paasword | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Generating secure, unique passwords based on user input and GPG key signatures, with optional time-based restrictions.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ GPG private key signing for password derivation â€¢ Unique password generation for each input â€¢ Time forgery support for generating future or past passwords â€¢ Terminal box rendering with CJK/ASCII alignment â€¢ Plain text output option for scripting
ðŸ“– Summary: Password Master is a password generator that uses GPG private key signatures to derive high-strength passwords from user inputs. It supports time forgery, allowing users to generate passwords valid for specific timeframes, enhancing security and control.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ NotelyVoice | C++
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Voice transcription and note-taking for students, professionals, doctors, and researchers.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Rich Text Editing â€¢ Simple Search â€¢ Smart Filtering â€¢ Organization with folders and tags â€¢ Advanced Speech-to-Text
ðŸ“– Summary: NotelyVoice is a cross-platform, private AI voice transcription and note-taking application built with Compose Multiplatform. It leverages Whisper AI for on-device speech-to-text conversion in 50+ languages, ensuring user privacy by avoiding cloud uploads. The app is available on Android and iOS.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸš€ repomix_wx | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Generating compact repository overviews for use in LLM prompts.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Choose project/repo directory â€¢ Included files list (auto-excludes exact and glob patterns) â€¢ Exclusions: exact file paths and glob ignore patterns â€¢ Command preview with auto-wrap â€¢ Run `repomix` in selected root
ðŸ“– Summary: The repository provides a GUI wrapper around the `repomix` CLI tool, enabling users to generate compact repository overviews for LLM prompts. It offers features like project directory selection, file exclusion, command preview, and output style selection, with options persisted in a state file.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸŒŸ akniga-scraper | Go
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Downloading audiobooks from akniga.org for offline listening.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Downloads audio from akniga.org â€¢ Automates cookie and book ID retrieval â€¢ Decrypts HLS link using a key extracted from the website's JavaScript â€¢ Uses ffmpeg for audio downloading
ðŸ“– Summary: The akniga-scraper is a Go-based tool designed to download content from akniga.org. It automates the process of obtaining necessary cookies and book IDs, decrypting the audio HLS link, and ultimately downloading the audio content.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ h3xassist | TypeScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Automating the process of recording, transcribing, and summarizing online meetings.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Automatic Meeting Join â€¢ Audio Recording â€¢ Speech Recognition â€¢ AI Summarization â€¢ Calendar Integration
ðŸ“– Summary: H3xAssist is an automated meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and summarizes online meetings. It supports platforms like Microsoft Teams and Google Meet, offering features like real-time dashboards, AI-generated summaries, and speaker diarization. The system integrates with Outlook calendars and provides a responsive web interface for configuration and usage.
